body:
Also a go build bug.

```
pwd
/Users/jbd/src/github.com/opennota/go-generate-issue/a

go build -tags tag1 .
echo $?
0

go build -tags tag1 ./...
warning: "./..." matched no packages
warning: "./..." matched no packages

# the following works
go build -tags tag1 github.com/opennota/go-generate-issue/a/...
```
